website_summaries.verdict: A long lasting lawn mower battery that is easy to use.
pros: This battery is easy to install and has 12 volts and 18 amps
Holds a charge a long time
cons: Some buyers said the actual amps weren't as promised

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Using them in series to make 48v for a 3000va APC. Going to just keep adding sets of 4 in series when I get the spare cash. Batteries came fully charged, and seemed to all have a manufacturer date of 03/2017. I'll update if I run into any issues etc
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great Gell Cell replacement. If it fits your unit, a good replacement.
customer_reviews.text: It seems like an exact replacement for the battery that came in my Statpower Portawattz Power Pac. This was an older unit that's not available now but still works great with the new battery. The battery fits perfectly and as a great bonus, the battery holds the charge for a very long time before it needs recharging. Highly recommend this battery if it fits your unit.
customer_reviews.author: Roger JamesTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Good value and fresh stock.
customer_reviews.text: I believe most / all of these SLA batteries are produced by the same factory(s) in China whatever the brand. So I typically select them based on price. These came factory fresh with an out of box voltage of 12.9 volts. As with all SLA batteries, these will serve you well if you keep them charged and do not deeply discharge them. If not in use, top up charge every three months or so will significantly extend the life of these batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy H

customer_reviews.title: It it like the energizer bunny commercials
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to stick in my kids electric car and have only charged it once. It it like the energizer bunny commercials, it just keeps going and going and going. He drives he car several times a day and it has been a week now. Unreal! Love it and the price. OH - FYI I am not affiliated with whoever sold me the battery nor did I receive anything for this review. Jarrod
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Ochsenbein

customer_reviews.title: It works, saved me the expense of a new power station
customer_reviews.text: I have a Power Station X that I have had for about 6 years. When I needed it to jump off my wife's car, it was not up to the task and the battery would not recharge adequately. A search of the manufacturer's web site did not address replacing the battery at all! However, there was a youtube video showing how to do it. I cross referenced my battery to ascertain the above battery was the one I needed. The replacement was rather simple and I now have an essentially new power station at less than half the cost!
customer_reviews.author: K. Keppel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect power wheels replacement battery!
customer_reviews.text: Hooked this up to my power wheels and it runs amazing. Longer run time quicker trickle charge with a battery tender. Cut off the old powerwheels connector, and made my own plugs with a crimp spade connector and socket. I also picked up a small led volt meter and wired it in also, so I can monitor the battery voltage while my kids use it. We ran full blast for an hour and it only dropped 1 volt. It is a bit different size, so I took out the old mount, and used a bungie cord for a new mount. Super happy!
customer_reviews.author: Earl L.

customer_reviews.title: solid, capacity is as rated, and the top prevents shorts (see link to good charger)
customer_reviews.text: I tested the capacity and it is as rated... quite a nice change from all the fake amp-hour ratings on lithium battery packs! The terminals don't stick out so it's easy to put this in a tight case and not get shorts. It specifies 5A charging, and this charger provides exactly that charge rate (constant current until almost fully charged):
customer_reviews.author: S. EckertTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: CPAP Use :)
customer_reviews.text: I used this battery for CPAP Therapy while out with the Boy Scout Troop during summer camp. Got 2 good nights use off a single charge. Sure beats the $200-$300 batteries that the medical supply wants to sale, which are only good for 1 night.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Allen

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a DIY project to run a small computer in my vehicle with the engine turned off. I put it through a couple shallow cycles and a couple deep cycles and so far it's performing very well. It's stronger than I expected from a full charge down to 11.2-11.5v or so, but then drops toward 10.5v more rapidly. I was able to run the computer and inverter that powers it for almost 8 hours down to flat dead just to see what I'm working with. I don't plan on doing that very often, probably won't last so long. But for the price I can replace it if I have to... Very happy with this so far!
customer_reviews.author: duke

customer_reviews.title: Fits Costco PSX2 Jump Start/Air Pump  Box
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace battery in Costco PSX2 Jump Start Battery. Physical fit was perfect, came to a complete charge overnight. Only issue with my specific use was that the terminals were in a slightly different location than the original which complicated (but did not prevent) hooking up the jump start cables. Note that the terminal WERE in the location that is depicted on in the ad. Did a lot of looking and while this can be bought cheaper from other sources, by the time you add shipping, cost was within a couple of dollars. Local prices were very similar as well. Ordered Wednesday night, arrived Thursday afternoon (standard 2 day shipping)!
customer_reviews.author: BilliyBob54

customer_reviews.title: Used for a Century Jumper 1000
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use in a Century Jumper 1000. Real easy replacement 4 screws and two bolts. A total of 15 minutes and was done. Used it the next morning to jump a Farmall 400 tractor that had been sitting a month.
customer_reviews.author: Coz

customer_reviews.title: fits in Peak 900 jump starter.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace the battery in a Peak 900 jump starter. I opened the jump starter case and got the part number off the battery.. Then I searched for that part number and matched to this unit. Fit perfectly. half the price of a new jump battery. I will take care to NOT leave the unit charging for weeks. That kills the battery. just charge 24 hrs and remove from charger.
customer_reviews.author: Johnf

customer_reviews.title: Ok for some
customer_reviews.text: The batteries arrived on time and in proper shipment, but not the performance I expected. I have the GoGo Elite Traveller Four Wheel Scooter I use for traveling when we vacation. The original batteries that came with the scooter had much more take off power, and longevity. after only two days the energy meter on the scooter started reading low after only one hour of use, this is after charging every night. So for some uses these batteries might be ok, for motorized electronics, maybe not.
customer_reviews.author: ScottyH

customer_reviews.title: Caution - Maker 'not obligated' to honor warranty
customer_reviews.text: My battery failed in app. 9-10 months. That's when I learned that, despite the product listing, the maker does not consider themselves to be 'obligated' to honor the warranty when sold through Amazon, but does it as a 'courtesy' to the buyer. They do not pay return shipping, and they allow up to 30 days to test the product on return, so in my case I could plan to wait for up to 40 days, including shipping both ways, for a possible replacement.
customer_reviews.author: G. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Does not deliver
customer_reviews.text: Got battery a couple of months ago but just recently monitored it's performance. It has a half amp load, so I expected it to last at least 30 hours on a charge, but it only lasts a few hours. Contacted the company who said that it was NOT under warranty because it was sold by Amazon. No where in the warranty page does it specifically exclude items bought on Amazon. Why would they do this? To sell out of date/defective batteries to unwary buyers. Many other more reputable battery suppliers - choose one of them instead of Expert Power.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy battery assembly resulted in dangerous explosion when in service
customer_reviews.text: This is a sealed battery that was assembled incorrectly, with several of the cell caps not placed securely over the cells. I suspect as a result the water inside evaporated and dirt also entered the cells. Within 2 weeks of being placed in service the battery exploded while the machine was in operation. The force of the blast actually snapped a metal bracket holding the starter relay located behind the battery box. There was no acid spill suggesting the battery was dry. Unfortunately the return window passed before the battery was placed in service.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Volturo

customer_reviews.title: I purchased a set of these in July 2016, ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set of these in July 2016, less then 12 months later, the battery fails to take a charge. The batteries are warrantied for 12 months, but sending it back will be cost prohibited. I'll try a different brand this time.
customer_reviews.author: Rory in Georgia

customer_reviews.title: It replaced a battery which had been working great until it just got to old
customer_reviews.text: Battery failed completely after only two month on my generator. It replaced a battery which had been working great until it just got to old. This replacement which is supposedly 'sealed', popped its top and there was hardly any liquid in the cells. There does not seem to be a 'return item' option on Amazon so I am contacting customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Guichelaar

customer_reviews.title: Working fine for my Ham Radio Ammo Can Power Supply
customer_reviews.text: I recently built a "ammo can power supply" for Ham Radio Emergency use in the field. The battery was a good compromise in terms of size, weight, price, and Amp/Hour rating. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Buy another brand.  I'll never buy this one again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in April to replace a starter battery in a piece of landscaping equipment. The battery was fully charged at the time I installed it, but it sat pretty much idle (no load) over the Summer. I tried to use it today and it was dead and would not take a charge. I'll never buy this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: TomWS

customer_reviews.title: dose not move at all apparently construction is not able to handle any bumps don't wast your money like i did this was supposed
customer_reviews.text: this is 2nd battery first one lasted 2 months new one lasted 3 months. battery is mounted on go kart runs only led lights, tech, and speedo. both came apart internally. Battery sits in frame and has a rubber cushion under it and has a top strap on it. dose not move at all apparently construction is not able to handle any bumps don't wast your money like i did this was supposed to be replacement for the power wheels should be able to handle a go kart.
customer_reviews.author: martin pierz

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good battery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this battery to replace the one in my Stanley Jump Start System. It works great so far I’ve started a welding machine and a F-450 with no problems very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Big Fred

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: This battery was purchased to replace one in an automotive jump box. Even though it has higher numbers than the one it is replacing it won’t start a car with a dead battery. At best it’s only good to charge my phone. Amazon will not return because they state it’s a shipping hazard. Wouldn’t it of been a shipping hazard shipping to me? Oh well....sometimes Mr Jeff burns ya!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expert Power Battery EXP 12180
customer_reviews.text: I bought the battery in late 2017. It is for the emergency generator. I used it twice and I kept the Noco Genius charger on it to prevent it from completely discharged. I have not had a chance to test my generator for almost a year now so I decided to use the battery to jump-start the generator. Unfortunately, the battery only stays at 25% charged and will not go beyond that. Of course, this is beyond the warranty period and it's my loss. I will need to buy another battery now. I paid $33 for 2 charges. Sad
customer_reviews.author: Bamboo

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would've had dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be a good direct replacement for my son's power wheels boomerang. Width seemed like the only thing that was okay. Ended up being a tad too long and about and inch or two too tall. Was hoping I didn't have to cut into the car itself to make this work. I might update later with dimensions if I get to it in time. Other than that it seems to work okay.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Does not Last
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these batteries for my wifes scooter in March 2019. I never purchased this brand before and usually get at least 18 to 20 months out of a set. I have made sure that I charge bought batteries according to the requirements of the manufacturer. We tried to use the scooter this week an got about an hour of use before the scooter display showed that it was dying. I ordered replacements with Amazon for a brand I have used in the past. They arrived today and when opening up my scooter battery case I found one of the batteries was leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Emens

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it NEGATIVE stars it would get 5! Bought it for a generator, was dead in a week. Will not take a full charge. Attempted to recharge, it seemed to take it, (12.5v) but as soon as you put a load on it it drops to 3.2v. Battery is dead. If your thinking of purchasing this, just toss $40 in the trash can, at least you know your throwing away money......
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased/installed end of April 2019. Noticed heat coming from them when using mobility svooter plus was losing power quickly. Opened case, batteries were swollen, out of shape and HOT! So, obviously a waste of $$ and dangerous! Look somewhere else! Lasted 3 months!
customer_reviews.author: Rhee LaFountain

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery for Power Wheel's 12 volt ride on toys
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two for each of our grandchildren's 12 volt Power Wheels ride on toys - jeep and truck. They work great!! Was able to switch over the charging / connectors easily. They keep going and going and going!! Much more powerful and last longer than the OE batteries. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Greenville Native

customer_reviews.title: Great for CPAP
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my CPAP while camping for 3 years, and this battery worked better than any other I've tried! I was able to use it for 3 nights without recharging it, which was amazing. Recharged with a simple solar charger, and it worked great for the rest of the camping trip. My CPAP is a RESMED Airsense 10. I used it with a DC adapter ($32) and set the tubing and humidity to off. The only thing I will change for next time is to get a better clip on DC outlet for it. The one I used was for bigger battery terminals. While it didn't slip off, I was concerned it would.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Childs

customer_reviews.title: Came dead
customer_reviews.text: When I got the batteries I immediately put them on a smart charger. After a whole day on the smart charger and they were reading full, I placed them in my UPS system and tested them. They lasted about 10 seconds which is no where near what I calculated at 30% UPS load. So I took them out and put them through tests on my smart charger. Turns out they weren't holding a charge at all. After some messing around I came to the conclusion that they were both DOA. Contacted support and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: dead on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I bought this battery to replace another one that was in side my energy battery charger. Now I charged it and put it in may car and used it twice and recharged. However from the time I bought it in February 2019 to March 2020 and only using it twice this battery has died. The cost of this battery was what I would pay for a car battery and it just doesn't work in a time of a energy is unacceptable. I want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, perfect value
customer_reviews.text: After my Power Station Jumpstarter PSX3 quit charging I needed to either replace the entire unit or just find a new battery. This battery not only fits perfectly, it has additional amperage when compared to the battery I removed. Simple to remove the case screws and take the wires off the old battery. This one was almost 100% charged, so that was a nice plus. I get to keep my jumper, and have more umph when helping out a stranded co-worker!
customer_reviews.author: R. Grauberger

customer_reviews.title: 12 volt batteries
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like writing bad reviews if seller responds will change to five Order two units of same batteries Description says comes with bolts and nuts to mount wire One unit have everything and looks new other have scratches and don’t have hardware Looks like someone returning and seller send it again to other customers with out even opening and checking if something missing
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my 2001 Kawasaki 900 STS. I made it work but did expect it to fit in the factory position with the factory hardware but it did not. Everything else about the battery Worked for my application.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: At first battey would charge and last a few days in my daughters powerwheels. Each time I’ve charged it it’s listed less and less with now only getting 4 minures out of the use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Power wheel battery
customer_reviews.text: Battery works great for our daughters power wheel Jeep didn't fit exactly but it was an easy convert for my husband. Jeep runs great haven't charged it since first installation kids use it bunch of times plenty of power. Surprised it didn't fit perfectly I had read reviews prior to purchasing and thought it was the right fit but like I said it was easy to fix and works great
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Choice
customer_reviews.text: Price was right. Promptly delivered. Used in Grandma's Merits Power Chair. Only lasted 4 months. In last month, full charge lasted 15 minutes. Took to local Battery Store and failed test load capacity test. Swapped them for comparable top-dollar Duracell battery with a 1 year warranty. Lesson = don't buy cheap stuff! Two stars for price, delivery and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dutcher

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This battery replacement did not hold a charge at all. Ended up tossing out the battery and the unit. Will be cheaper to buy a new "jump box" than gamble on a new battery. Not sending good money after bad.
customer_reviews.author: Christian D'Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for my kayak motor!
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this to push my Pelican Catch 120 kayak, and it’s working great so far. I’ve used it at least a dozen times and haven’t had any issues. Today’s trip was the first time I completely drained it. But I basically ran the motor wide open, non-stop, against the wind. It ran like that for 4 hours! I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.author: runnerguy

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is more about the customer service.... and it was AMAZING! Battery arrived initially on time and as expected. Installed it and it cranked the bike over but showed it was not fully charged. No worries - I put the trickle charger on and..... suffice to say, the battery ultimately was tested and it wouldn't hold a charge. Emailed (didn't have to call or anything!) and indicated the problem and received a new battery w/in 2 days! installed it last nite and so far it's good! thank you!!!!
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Works But Fit Is Off
customer_reviews.text: Fits well in the jumper case, charged right up and is holding so far (a few weeks). My one gripe, and it could be a deal breaker for some, the posts are on the correct side of the battery, but the offset is reversed. The attachment points were farther inboard than my original battery. I didn't notice if this was the case in the picture or not. I was able to make a couple small changes to get my cable attachments to fit but it is tight.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: works great in an electric lawnmower
customer_reviews.text: we have earthwise lawnmower (cordless electric) and the battery failed. I got two of these, then opened the battery compartment using a long screwdriver and replaced the batteries. Works! Tips: when you open up the battery cover, take a picture of the wires before removing them. Pay attention where the positive and negative poles are. This is one instance when high school physics pays off! :)
customer_reviews.author: customer in VA

customer_reviews.title: Easy replacement for a jump box
customer_reviews.text: I used this battery as a replacement for the internal battery in a Costco battery jumper box/air compressor. The cost and ease of replacing the battery far outweighed the almost of replacing the whole unit. I've used it twice as a jump box and quite a few times as an air compressor since. I have no complaints at all about the power and life so far.
customer_reviews.author: m.braunworth

customer_reviews.title: Replace your Power Wheels battery with this!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a replacement for my sons FJ Cruiser Power Wheels, works great. I did have to make some modifications to the battery compartment to make it fit but you should expect that from anything other than a factory battery. This is half the price of OEM and runs twice as long. The kids can ride until they are tired of it and it still have juice left. Would recommend this to anyone! Ended up going with the Schumacher SC-1200A for a charger. Works perfectly and now I have a nice charger for my car if I ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Barely works
customer_reviews.text: This battery has absolutely no pickup in my sons power wheels it does kinda work but jus barely. It also dies way before the original battery which is way way better than this one. I only bought this battery to extend his run time and it doesn’t extend it at all just enough time to get the truck back to the garage and put everything back on changer I don’t know if it i just received a bad battery or if it’s just not powerful enough. Either way it doesn’t do what it should given the other reviewers and it’s own description.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Told Not Usable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ‘Expert Power EXP12180 Lead_Acid_Battery’ via Amazon on 4/21/19. From the beginning, the battery seemed to have a very weak charge. Also, it even started to leak after being recharged. It is not usable. I feel like I have wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Rolwes

customer_reviews.title: Saved our sons power wheels jeep
customer_reviews.text: Our battery for our power wheels jeep had given up the ghost. We purchased this along with an adapter cable and his little jeep flies now and lasts at least 5 times longer than before. He can drive it on the grass with decent speed. We have a happy little camper at our house!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hill

customer_reviews.title: Use caution to check for terminal match before choosing this one
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of not checking to see if the terminals would match. I had googled the battery specs needed for a powerwheel devise and selected this battery. Problem is that the terminals are different and this battery will not work on the powerwheel product. Check carefully for a match before choosing your battery.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck C

customer_reviews.title: Warranty, sellers all invisible.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this battery this spring and installed in Walker mower in April. This mower is seldom used, only as a back up. The third time I attempted to start the mower, the unit was dead, totally dead, no solenoid click. Placed 1.5 amp slow charger on battery, wouldn't take a charge, no voltage present whatever. Checked for continuity, the battery had no resistance suggesting a broken internal connection. Began checking on how to engage warranty. A joke, totally a joke. Expert Power disclaims responsibility saying they don't warrant that which is sold by Amazon and Amazon makes it impossible to contact them. What a scam, Amascam?
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Held a charge for about 3 months. I used it as a replacement for my jumper pack. After the 1st time used to jump an 03 Ford explorer with the small v8. It did good. But now it doesnt hold a charge for long. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: perfect for willys power wheels jeep
customer_reviews.text: I picked up the “willys” jeep power wheels from walmart and this battery fits perfectly once you remove the stock battery bracket. I charged it with a 750ma trickle charger (designed for car batteries). We ran for hours on a single charge in challenging off-road conditions (low speed only); I don’t know runtime yet but it seems impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Smith

customer_reviews.title: Check the actual dimensions of your battery compartment against the battery specs.
customer_reviews.text: This battery was not sized to fit my JD mower, although it was listed as a replacement for my mower. I should have checked the demensions of the battery before ordering. After a considerable amount of reconfiguring, I made it fit and it seems to work fine, but it was a pain in the xxx.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Waldrop

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for a Go Go Elite Traveller Plus
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for a Go Go Elite Traveller Plus Scooter to replace the bloated, defunct originals. They are direct replacements for this scooter. The price was a little higher than I wanted to pay, but not bad by comparison, and they really seem to hold a charge. The Go Go has been used every day for over a week now without charging, or a noticeable drop in power, and the scooter's indicator light still says it's fully charged. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marv Duper

customer_reviews.title: Pimp my ride
customer_reviews.text: The best way to keep your kids ride on toy going all day long is worth one of these! I put one in an old 10yr old kids Jeep back in 2015, and it's still going strong. I bought another one for a new ride on for the 3 year old. Out of the box, these ride on toys are dead in 30 min even on an overnight charge. With some modifications and this battery, they have gone 2 days between charges. I ditched the toys charger and use a Schumacher trickle charger. It has it topped off from dead to full in 10-12 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: JayP

customer_reviews.title: A waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.text: They replaced the first defective battery after lecturing me that because I bought it through Amazon they didn’t have to honor the warranty. But now the second battery has died. Don’t waste your time or money and just buy one at one of the big box hardware stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Batteries So Far
customer_reviews.text: After completing a full charge, these were placed in a mobility scooter and powered up just fine. We actually purchased two so that the patient would have a spare while the first one charged and would not be immobilized. So far, we haven't needed to change out the batteries. The only complaint I have is that shipping was somewhat slow, and it caused an elderly woman with cancer to be stuck in bed for over a week while we waited for these to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: JazzyV

customer_reviews.title: Used many many times
customer_reviews.text: This has never leaked and holds a charge very very well. I use this for my trolling motor on my boat and it’s fantastic. Perfect size, doesn’t get too hot. This is exactly what is needed for anyone thinking about a boat for rivers or lakes
customer_reviews.author: David Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Battery failed after just a few months in my mower, thought I had a charging problem NOPE! Battery got to the point where it wouldn't charge. No doesn't have enough power to do anything with. JUST BUY THE GOOD BATTERY NOT THIS ONE!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Faunce

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for Craftsman Generator
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly. Generator started right up. I expect it to last about 5 years. Biggest headache is that you have to remove fuel tank to get to battery. Bad craftsman design, battery good. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike + Lynn

customer_reviews.title: bought one in 2017 and it lasted bought one in 2019 only lasted couple months
customer_reviews.text: I built a cooler stereo for my daughters travel softball team to play walk up sound cuts and warm up music and I used this battery to power it, The first one was purchased in 2017 and it lasted 18 months. when it went dead I re-ordered the same unit in 2019 and it only lasted a few months.Same set up and charging routine so Im not sure why
customer_reviews.author: Craig H.

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.text: This battery, although heavy, is small enough to fit in a drawer. I have it for a power inverter for when power is out so I can power my life chair. The chair has a backup, but it is weak and this works well. I can power and charge my devices. Unable to rate longevity, as I haven't had it long enough to test that.
customer_reviews.author: CabbieMom

customer_reviews.title: generator battery
customer_reviews.text: got this battery to replace my original battery in my Troy-Bilt Generator I have had for 6 years Replacing it was not an issue and it fit in perfectly, only had it for a month so cant really rate it for longevity. We will see how it holds up over the winter. Am still using the original charger.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: start that generator
customer_reviews.text: The battery is great, i bought it for a friend's generator it fit Perfectly and its not the battery's fault it was hard to install. Its nice to have a electric start on a generator. It started up and worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Quality Battery for any 12 volt Ride-On Vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Great product and excellent replacement for any child ride on vehicle. Lasts much longer than the standard battery pack and is less bulky. It is also easy to charge with many of the universal 12 volt charges. I highly recommend getting the Noco Genius G750 charge with this product.
customer_reviews.author: JCG

customer_reviews.title: Good Battery
customer_reviews.text: I use these batteries (this is my 4th) in the small travel trailers I build. They are used to power 3 - 12v led lights for the interior. They are small in size, but big in power and each one I've used has performed flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hiser

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price I will be back to buy another one
customer_reviews.text: I was actually surprised by this battery it provides a good charge and will start a scooter or run a power chair for hours it'll even runs a cooler radio that I made for hours and I recharge it with a solar-powered charger/ maintainer
customer_reviews.author: Guy B.

customer_reviews.title: Danger Explosive
customer_reviews.text: Installed the battery on a DR 18 hp chipper. Within a short while of use, I heard a loud “bang”. I shut the unit down and inspected, I finally noticed, the battery exploded!! Contacted Amazon, and was immediately issued a refund. I Definitely DO NOT recommend this battery!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Powerwheel replacement battery
customer_reviews.text: Our luck with powerwheel brand batteries has been horrible! They don’t last and are so expensive! We stumbled upon a website suggesting to use this instead..PERFECT! It lasts for days (unless they’re outside majority of the day using it..then just for one day) but still..that’s amazing in comparison to 2hours MAX with a powerwheel battery! Charge it up overnight and it’s good to go again.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonlord4545

customer_reviews.title: Good Battery
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be doing well after a bit of time. I used this to replace a battery in a Costco jump pack. Be careful about terminal style, I thought this battery was the same, but only a slight difference caused me a headache and I had to make modifications to the jump pack. Not any fault of the battery, but just pay very close attention.
customer_reviews.author: Fish

customer_reviews.title: Excellent RBC7 alternative!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 years old APC Smart UPS (SMT1500) died, I bought two of EXP12180 to replace RBC7 battery. As long as the cable and fuse terminals are fine, simply remove from dead RBC7 module and gang two EXP12180 togater to make equivalent battery unit. ☺
customer_reviews.author: Domo

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money!
customer_reviews.text: The battery will not hold a charge. Won't charge over 12V. Highest I can into the batter is 11.7v Find something else! Had the battery for one month.
customer_reviews.author: Giuseppe Munno

customer_reviews.title: Mostly my fault.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's fine, but due to not measuring beforehand it ended up being too tall for use in my generator. Make sure you realize there are no returns through Amazon for this. In their defense, ExpertPower did contact me an ask me to call to make arrangements to return it. However, due to so much going on at the time I didn't get to ever make the call. They don't do it over email, so I didn't get to submit that way. I'm sure the battery is good, just make sure and not do what I did and order it without measuring your space first.
customer_reviews.author: Mark37857

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have many uses for these from a small solar battery bank for my outdoor security camera to replacing the batteries in my APC 1500 series. These batteries saved me $40 vs buying the apc battery pack on Amazon (which is $100 and these where $33 when I purchased them). Just had to remove the wire connector and fuse from the old batteries and connect the new ones. Pretty simple and perfect fit. Hopefully they last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Eli glass

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: Battery showed up four days late. Packed was destroyed and the battery doesn’t work at all. Company doesn’t except returns.. 100% don’t buy and buy from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this May 5th and on July 4th I needed to jump the battery because it was dead. After I jumped and and let it charge the battery did not hold the charge and needed jumped again. Of course the return date was June 5th and not ample time for adequate testing.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Replacement Battery
customer_reviews.text: The battery in my jump starter would not hold a charge so I purchased this Expert Powe replacement and it fit perfectly in the battery case. It holds a charge for quite a long time and it powers my VHF/UHF ham radio tranceiver very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, holds charge
customer_reviews.text: Not sure on longevity yet, but works and was exact fit for a Schumacher jump pack for car. Hope it seal holds, that was the problem with the oem battery.
customer_reviews.author: Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this battery to replace the battery in my emergency engine starter. It fit perfectly. The new battery arrived fully charged. After several days it was still fully charged. I anticipate many years of standby service. If this is not the case, I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Teo Frank

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper alternative to a Power Wheels battery
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper and longer lasting charge than the power wheels battery. Just takes a little work that can be done by almost anyone. Just check out a youtube video and your kid will be up and running in no time for like half the price!
customer_reviews.author: carguy123

customer_reviews.title: Will not hold charge.
customer_reviews.text: Finally installed a month ago, lasted about 3 open-close cycles of cylinder actuator. Charged with battery tender and tried smaller shop battery charger, will not take a charge. Costs almost $9 to ship back. I do not recommend & would have been off better purchasing from local lawn and garden center.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: ... this battery up into the chair and it worked fine for a good 10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I plug this battery up into the chair and it worked fine for a good 10 minutes. So I charged the battery for a full 24 hours and now it does not work at all. Please don't waste your money on this battery because it does not work or will not work no longer than 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: WT

customer_reviews.title: Even better was the smile on my grandpa's face when he ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandfather's power chair ("Rascal") takes two of these. I was pleasantly surprised to learn that I could find them on amazon for 1/3 the price of the hobby store I had to get these at before. Even better was the smile on my grandpa's face when he told me to get rid of the backup power chair he had because his old batteries never lasted his whole day. A simple, quality battery made a big difference to this guy. I'll definitely consider this brand first should I need specialty batteries again.
customer_reviews.author: Jsen

customer_reviews.title: I live in Wisconsin. Lasted 2 seasons on my riding lawn mower
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all. I also had to use a maintainer just to get the stupid thing started the second season. You get what you pay for. If you want a battery for a riding lawn mower go 35 amps not this 18 amp garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Raz

customer_reviews.title: defective power holding capability
customer_reviews.text: Did not last more than a month. Originally charged on trickle charger overnight only to find the next day would not start the vehicle. I'v had the main unit for over year and am very familiar with it. This replacement battery is not up to snuff as they say and I would not recommend buying this version
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Westinghouse Generator
customer_reviews.text: Needed a batt to replace a 4 year old Westinghouse 7000w generator. Does not fit the mounting plate as this batt is too tall for the bracket, but with some creative mounting, can be done. You MUST strap the battery to the generator mounting plate/base as it will vibrate off when the gen is running. Started well!
customer_reviews.author: Herb R.

customer_reviews.title: Replaced the original Peg Perego power wheels battery.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a battery in the kids Peg Perego power wheels. The old one was 12AH and this one is 18ah so it lasts a little longer. I also got the Schumacher SEM-1562A-CA battery charger which has a maintainer feature so if the battery sits I just leave it plugged in. Way better than the factory power wheels charger.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Fits Gentron 8000 generators
customer_reviews.text: I bought this battery for my 85 year old dad’s generator. He has frequent power outages in his hollow in PA. I put it on and with the push of a button it fired right up. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad battery
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my jumppack to start car at my body shop. Same rateing as the battery that was in my jumppack..will show full charge when to try to start a car it drops down in the red..would not recommend this battery..used it twice..my orignal battery lasted 3 years..
customer_reviews.author: CT,Bullhead

customer_reviews.title: Only last 24 months
customer_reviews.text: Used in residential system. Bought 3 and all died right around 24 months mark. Used to getting 3-5 years! Not a good value considering the short lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Morrison

customer_reviews.title: hOW LONG HAD THIS BEEN ON THE SHELF
customer_reviews.text: so I bought this for a champion generator. When I removed the plastic protectors for the terminals the negative terminal was covered with corrosion. Are you kidding me . no one bothered to check anything out with this battery. the terminal was also scuffed up. After I cleaned the crap off I NOTICED THE MARKS. I THINK IT HAD BEEN USED. wELCOME TO OUR FAST PACED GET IT SOLD WORLD. sad
customer_reviews.author: rodney johnson

customer_reviews.title: Dead, and won't take a charge, after less than 18 months.
customer_reviews.text: Died and will not accept a charge after less than 18 months. I kept it on a trickle charger, and only used it once a month to power up a generator, and now it won't take a charge. I tried a second charger, with the same result. Bad. Bad. Bad.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalScott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two similar sealed lead acid batteries to replace worn out batteries in a car jumpstart / tire air compressor product; this was one of them. Battery arrived on time, well packaged, and everything as advertised. Since the battery was a perfect match for the one I was replacing, installation was quick and easy. Battery didn't seem to have been sitting on a shelf too long as it was immediately usable, but I topped off the charge anyway.
customer_reviews.author: David Buck

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I’m using it to pull my generator up a ramp into my garage “closet.” Works very well. It’s holding 13+ volts after being charged.
customer_reviews.author: Gary K

customer_reviews.title: Replacement battery
customer_reviews.text: Have 10,000 watt generator with electric start. First battery ii purchased was faulty. It was replaced without any problem and have had it now for several years
customer_reviews.author: Anton P Steg

customer_reviews.title: correct model for my application
customer_reviews.text: Very specific requirement for the generator that uses this ~ Glad it was correct, it fixed the electric starter ~ Hasn't worked in 5 years ~
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great power supply for garage stereo
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this battery to power an old car stereo I use for music while I'm working in my garage. The Alpine HU is rated at 14W RMS x 4 and is bi-amping an old Boston Acoustics component set and it works great! When I'm done in the garage I plug the battery into a smart charger so it's ready for use the next time I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: works great for my kids' power wheels jeep
customer_reviews.text: works great for my kids' power wheels jeep. I cut the connector / harness off of the original battery, stripped the wire ends, and screwed the wires to the leads on this battery. It works great, has much longer run time, and charges well with the stock power wheels charger.
customer_reviews.author: Slow Racer

customer_reviews.title: Won't Hold CHARGE
customer_reviews.text: Got one use of the battery than nothing. Ordered the rechargeable battery to use for with a outdoor Race Clock. First day of use was fine. The battery and Race Clock were securely stored overnight. The second day there was no power at all. Brought the battery back inside to recharge thinking it might a just drained overnight. Never got any more power out of it. Truly disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie W.

customer_reviews.title: Good batteries
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 to replace original batteries in a Go Go Sport 3 wheel mobility scooter. Batteries arrived fully charged and were easy to install. All's well!
customer_reviews.author: H. Chang

product_meta.title: ExpertPower EXP12180 12V18AH Lead_Acid_Battery
product_meta.description: Expert Power EXP12180 12 Volt 18 Ah Rechargeable Battery with Nuts and Bolts
feature_bullets: Battery Type - 12 Volt 18 Amp 20 Hour Sealed Lead Acid Battery With nuts and bolts
Rugged Construction - The High Impact Resistant Battery Case Is Made Up Of A Non-Conductive ABS Plastic. This Material Has a Strong Resistance To Shock, Vibration, Chemicals and Heat.
Genuine ExpertPower Battery - The Most Trusted And Highest Reviewed Sealed Lead Acid Batteries On Amazon
AGM Tech - Utilizes Absorbed Glass Mat (AGM) Technology And Has A Wide Temperature Range
User Friendly - Easy Installation With a Very Durable And Rugged Construction

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,857 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
